1.0.name: wordpress/the
1.0.description: Based upon an idea developed while walking to the Afterparty at WordCamp Philly 2011 by George Stephanis (@Daljo628), John Hawkins (@VegasGeek), Dre Armeda (@DreMeda), and Ben Metcalfe (@DotBen), this plugin adds a shortcode of [the], which replaces the shortcode with either the, The, teh, or Teh depending on whether or not the caps or hipster parameters are set.
